name: dethiobiotin:sulfur sulfurtransferase
definition: Dethiobiotin + Sulfur donor + 2 S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + 2 e- + 2 H+ <=> Biotin + 2 L-Methionine + 2 5'-Deoxyadenosine
comment: the reactant sulfur is not elemental sulfur, but it may be from the enzyme itself ([2Fe-2S] iron-sulfur centre) multi-step reaction
